Class FunctionsPanel

java.lang.Object
  |

                          +--com.milk.uberchat.gui.FunctionsPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class FunctionsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This class is a panel which allows one to perform some common chat functions (sending messages, changing nicknames, setting topics).

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:
Serialized Form
